name: Warrants no changes to the summary
Deserves citation or merits revision, defer to the Board member listed below
description: add the member's name in the comment field

name: Merits discussion, defer to the Board member listed below
description: add the member's name in the comment field

name: Abstain
description: this means you do not feel you can judge the relevance or interest. Please use this option sparingly. Remember we are writing for a wide range of readers so your assessment of potential relevance or interest is important.
